fields.name: name
fields.description: A human readable name for the task.

fields.name: method
fields.description: The method which the task corresponds to.

fields.name: namespace
fields.description: Provides the fully qualified namespace for the function mapped to the task.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Labels a task as an input, output, or function.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A unique identifier used for task routing.

fields.name: consumes
fields.description: Describes for this context what datatype the task will consume.

fields.name: produces
fields.description: Describes for this context what datatype the task will produce.

fields.name: init_args
fields.description: Provides a map of initialization arguments (constructor arguments).
